resources.string:
Instructions -
 
1.Please select the question set provided before proceding.

2.Do not try to exit or minimise or start any other application as that will disqualify you and send your score as 0 to the server.

3.Please press the buttons carefully minding the above instruction.

4.If you have completed the test please notify the Invigilator before pressing the Submit button.

5.Once Submit button is pressed your current answers will be sent to the server for correction so, re-check your responses to be sure.
